author: orfeusnetwork
title: Cardano-based Travel Network
description: Commissions make travel services more expensive, and the lack of virus protection guarantees leads to a drastic drop in world travel.
solution: Cardano De-Fi Blockchain marketplace without commissions and global network of safe tourist sites with electronic files.
experience: Our team includes specialists in the platform economy, experts in the tourism industry, blockchain software developers and crypto traders.
